bill.title: Corporations; Publicly Traded Corporations; Mergers
bill.description: Amends shareholder voting requirements for proposed plans involving mergers or share exchanges of publicly traded corporations. (SB3024 HD1)

history.action: (S) Introduced.
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to CPN.
(S) The committee(s) on CPN added the measure to the public hearing scheduled on 02-09-12 9:00AM in conference room 229.

(S) The committee(s) on CPN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in CPN were as follows: 6 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Taniguchi, Galuteria, Green, Nishihara, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Solomon.
(S) Reported from CPN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2421) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1).
(S) 48 Hrs. Notice 03-01-12.
(S) Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
(H) Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 35) in amended form (SD 1).
(H) Pass First Reading
(H) Referred to ERB, referral sheet 40
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by ERB on Tuesday, 03-13-12 8:30AM in House conference room 312.

(H) The committees on ERB recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) McKelvey, Choy, Awana, Evans, Hashem, Tokioka, Tsuji, Marumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Brower, Nishimoto, Pine.
(H) Reported from ERB (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1018-12) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1; placed on the calendar for Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Herkes, Souki excused (2).
(H) Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Carroll, Herkes, Mizuno excused (3). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 327).
(S) Deferred until 03-21-12.
(S) Senate agrees with House amendments. Placed on the calendar for Final Reading on 03-22-12.
(S) One Day Notice 03-22-12.
(S) Passed Final Reading. 22 Aye(s); Aye(s) with reservations: none . 0 No(es): none. 3 Excused: Senator(s) Hee, Ihara, Shimabukuro.
(S) Enrolled to Governor.
(H) Received notice of Senate agreement and Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 425).
